mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_name, title, author, password, write_time, content) VALUES (#{board_name}, #{title}, #{author}, #{password}, #{write_time}, #{content});
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_name = #{board_name}, title = #{title}, author = #{author}, password = #{password}, write_time = #{write_time}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id};
